item.title: Item prices
item.dc:creator: @blazefire blazefire
item.description:
@blazefire wrote:

[quote=“Project Gamma, post:2, topic:107049”]Go to Shop.cfg right click if and open with notepad and you will see som,thing like this

[code]
//-----ShopID—ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount

shop = 1 @whi@Fine_Peekaying_Shit 1 1 391 5000 3751 2000 3749 2000 3753 3000 3755 2000 1127 2000 1079 2000 1093 2000 1163 2000 7535 5000 7460 2000 7461 5000 7462 5000 5574 500 5575 500 5576 500 3105 5000 6524 5000 6568 5000 6106 500 6107 1000 6108 1000 6109 1000 6110 1000 6111 1000

[/code][/quote] so does this let me change individual prices? can you post an example of it working?

Read full topic
